welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Quinta, a charming city known for its breathtaking landscape and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bermuda Dunes Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as a food court, gift shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bermuda Dunes Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Borrego Springs Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Borrego Springs Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salton City Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Salton City Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
